faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Promptor.

q1.question: What is a prompt?
q1.answer: A prompt is a text instruction given to a generative AI to get a specific result. The more detailed and well-structured the prompt, the better the results generated by the AI.

q2.question: Which AI models are supported?
q2.answer: Prompts generated by Promptor are optimized for all generative AI models: ChatGPT, GPT-4, Claude, Midjourney, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, and many others.

q3.question: Is the free plan really free?
q3.answer: Yes! The free plan lets you generate 10 prompts per month with no commitment and no credit card. Perfect for testing the service and seeing if it works for you.

q4.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
q4.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

q5.question: Are my prompts private?
q5.answer: Yes, all your prompts are private and secure. We never share your data with third parties and you can delete your prompts at any time.

q6.question: How does multilingual generation work?
q6.answer: You can generate prompts in 13 different languages. Simply select your desired language and our AI will adapt the prompt accordingly.
